    • addNode

      String addNode(NodeDescriptor dsc, Vector<ServiceDescriptor> nodeServices, boolean propagated) throws IMTPException, ServiceException, JADESecurityException
      Parameters:
      dsc - The Descriptor of the new Node
      nodeServices - The services currently installed on the new Node
      propagated - Flag indicating whether the new-node event was a propagated event within the replication mechanism
      Throws:
      IMTPException
      ServiceException
      JADESecurityException
